DOC.brief_summary: Sperms prepare sperm wash technique use assisted reproductive technology . Most commonly used sperm preparation method swim density gradient . Recent study show DNA integrity status spermatozoon relate success assist reproduction technique . Sperm preparation method may theoretically cause damage sperm DNA . Therefore important select optimum method sperm preparation cause least sperm DNA damage . Aim study investigate compare effect two different sperm preparation technique DNA fragmentation .
DOC.brief_title: Swim Gradient Methods Used Assisted Reproduction Techniques DNA Fragmentation Spermatozoa
DOC.criteria: Male factor subfertile group : Couples least two abnormal sperm analysis accord WHO criterion . Unexplained subfertile group : Couples normal sperm parameter , plus female normal ovulatory status patent fallopian tube hysterosalpingography laparoscopy .
